Posts.Content: Hi my wife had monoclonal antibody targeted therapy a form of immunization which she tolerated very well treatments were every three weeks involving over time flurouracil epirubicin cyclophosphamide taxotere herceptin kadcyla perjeta and loads of various tablets etc hope this is of help she was hers 2 postive Mets to bones lung and liver al-facto regards Paul
Posts.Title: Has anyone had immunotherapy?
